title: It says i'm in a game, but i'm not
body: I recently played a ranked game and won, at the end game screen i waited  for the game stats for a long time so i clicked "skip game stats". my duo partner Becquerrel  said he was for some reason still in game and had to reconnect, for me it just took me back to the home screen.I proceeded to spectate his match and it was the previous match loading screen but no one was connected.I then exited  and attempted to invite him to a ranked queue, But it said " Woah you are already in a game.Give the client a restart". So i did and when i got back i had the same problem as him. At this point we're both really confused and someone  also in the game we don't know added me on her smurf and asked if we had the same problem. I have no clue what else to do but please we need help fixing this riot!

replies.body:
I actually just finished replying to your duo partner's post about this same incident! It looks like what occurred was what we refer to as a *Ghost Game*. These happen when the game server has a hiccup and fails to report the outcome of the match. 

This shouldn't lasted longer than a few hours at most, at which point it resolves itself. Please let me know if this is still happening to you.
I'm in the same perdicament as well.
Its happening to me and its been there for 3 hours about. any clues on how to fix? I restarted my comp and my league a few times.{{summoner:30}} help...
I am having the same issue but with a custom game I made and then left, which it should have been closed by now. This has been going on for HOURS!
I have the same problem I also have no idea what to.
Same thing happened to me I reported it in report a bug section {{item:3070}} {{item:2050}}
